Package net.sourceforge.JDash.gui

Interface Summary
PaintableGauge A gauge that implements this interface will have it's updateDisplay method called.
SwingComponent A class implementing this interface will provide a method to return the SwingComponent it represents.
SwingComponentGauge A gauge that implements this interface is treated as a SWING/AWT componet, and placed on the gauge panel as such.
 

Class Summary
AbstractGauge An abstract gauge component.
AbstractGaugePanel This is the base class that ALL GaugePanel classes must extend.
AnalogGauge This is a basic analog gauge.
ConfigureFrame This class will display the main dashboard frame to the user.
DashboardFrame This class will display the main dashboard frame to the user.
DigitalGauge This is a basic digital gauge.
GaugeButton This is a special button that conforms to the look and feel of a gauge.
LEDGauge This is a basic LED style of gauge.
LEDGauge.LED Since each LEd Gauge is made up of 1-n LEDs, this class will hold the configuration values to represent a single LED.
LineGraphGauge Not yet implemented http://jcckit.sourceforge.net/UserGuide/animatedChart.html
Splash This is the main splash screen frame for the JDash program.
 

Enum Summary
DashboardFrame.MESSAGE_TYPE
